item.title: Rep. Bergman to Newsmax: Trump Given Mandate to Drain Swamp
item.description: Voters wanted President-elect Donald Trump to drain the swamp, and he is delivering, Rep. Jack Bergman, R-Mich., told Newsmax on Wednesday.
